entry.source: 〉 A group of armed men stand in{F801}your way...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A group of armed men stand in{F801}your way...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194003}Who are you? How can you be outside?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194003}Who are you? How can you be outside?{F801}

entry.source: "Kill them before they kill us."{F801}"Let's wait and see..."{F801}
entry.target: "Kill them before they kill us."{F801}"Let's wait and see..."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,194009}Hold, you two.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194010}Let's wait and see. Better to know{F801}our situation in full before reacting.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,194009}Hold, you two.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194010}Let's wait and see. Better to know{F801}our situation in full before reacting.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,194012}Let's wait and see. Right now, they're{F801}our only source of information.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,194012}Let's wait and see. Right now, they're{F801}our only source of information.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194014}K...Kiyoharu! Call Kiyoharu!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194015}You three, come with us!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194014}K...Kiyoharu! Call Kiyoharu!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194015}You three, come with us!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The group of armed men escorted{F801}{F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}inside...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The group of armed men escorted{F801}{F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}inside...{F801}

entry.source: ダミーです{F801}住民に話しかけるが逃げらます{F801}
entry.target: ダミーです{F801}住民に話しかけるが逃げらます{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,194001}Ah...! At last, someone we can talk to.{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,194002}Hoy, you lot. There's something we'd{F801}like to ask you...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,194001}Ah...! At last, someone we can talk to.{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,194002}Hoy, you lot. There's something we'd{F801}like to ask you...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194013}Huh...? That thing on your arm...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,194013}Huh...? That thing on your arm...!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The group of armed men pointed their{F801}weapons at you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The group of armed men pointed their{F801}weapons at you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,194007}...This bodes ill.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194008}Hoy, what do you think? We could be{F801}in danger...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,194007}...This bodes ill.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,194008}Hoy, what do you think? We could be{F801}in danger...{F801}
